description: The HpeNetworkPort resource describes the The HpeNetworkPort resource describes the Hewlett Packard Enterprise property extensions for Network Ports

#NetworkPort.DiagnosticsReset.description: Invoking this action will reset all diagnostic capabilities on this port to an inactive state.

AutoNegotiationCapable.description: Indicates the ability of this network port to autonegotiate link speed.

Evb.description: Edge Virtual Bridging (EVB) information for this port.

@odata.id.longDescription: The unique resource identifier for EVB information on this port.  When null, the resource is not available.

Lldp.description: Link-Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) information for this port.

@odata.id.longDescription: The unique resource identifier for LLDP information on this port.  When null, the resource is not available.

PortDiagnosticEnableLocalLoopback.description: When true, local loopback is active on this port.  PortDiagnosticsEnabled must first be true in order to set this property to true.

PortDiagnosticEnableRemoteLoopback.description: When true, remote loopback is active on this port. PortDiagnosticsEnabled must first be true in order to set this property to true.

PortDiagnosticLocalLoopbackCapable.description: When true, the port has local loopback capability.

PortDiagnosticRemoteLoopbackCapable.description: When true, the port has remote loopback capability.

PortDiagnosticsEnabled.description: When true, diagnostic features are enabled on this port.

VirtualFunctionAllocations.description: Indicates the maximum number of virtual functions that may be allocated per logical device function on this port.

NetworkDeviceFunction.description: The logical network device function to which this virtual function allocation applies.

@odata.id.longDescription: A unique resource identifer for the network device function this allocation pertains to.  When null, the function assignment is not available.

VirtualFunctionsAllocated.description: The number of virtual functions allocated to this logical network device function instance.

title: #HpeNetworkPort.v1_1_0.HpeNetworkPort
